nodes.text: Kalinda was an astronomical object located in the Mid Rim and the Trailing Sectors regions, in the grid square O-16 of the Standard Galactic Grid. A hyperspace route linked Kalinda to the planet Naboo and the celestial body Kira.
Kalinda was first depicted in the current Star Wars canon on a galactic map in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a 2016 Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game boxed set.

The Kalinda system was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity via the roleplaying game adventure "Den of Spies." It was written by Richard and Barbara Clark and Janelle Keberle for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and was included in the 1993 book Twin Stars of Kira.
